DOC.brief_summary: This is a multicenter study to evaluate the safety and efficacy of ezetimibe/simvastatin versus rosuvastatin in participants with high cholesterol.
DOC.brief_title: A Study to Assess the Cholesterol Lowering Effect of an Ezetimibe/Simvastatin Combination Tablet Compared to Another Cholesterol Lowering Drug in Patients With High Cholesterol and With High Cardiovascular Risk (0653A-809)(COMPLETED)
DOC.criteria: Participant is currently taking a statin medication for the treatment of high cholesterol Participant has an LDLC level that is greater than or equal to 100 mg/dl and less than or equal to 190 mg/dl Women who are pregnant or nursing, or women who intend to become pregnant Participant has any condition, situation, or is currently taking any medication that might pose a risk to the participant or interfere with participation in the study
